title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT COUNCIL (MDRRMC) RESOLUTION NO. 2025-09 DATED AUGUST 15, 2025, ENTITLED RESOLUTION REPROGRAMMING SEVERAL PORTIONS AND THE BALANCES OF APPROPRIATIONS OF THE 596 MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT FUND UNDER CURRENT APPROPRIATION AMOUNTING TO THREE MILLION FOUR HUNDRED TWENTY-NINE THOUSAND THREE HUNDRED SEVENTEEN PESOS AND 62/100 (PHP 3,429,317.62 UNDER CONTINUING APPROPRIATION AMOUNTING TO FOUR MILLION FIVE HUNDRED FIFTY-FOUR THOUSAND TWO HUNDRED EIGHTY-ONE PESOS AND 79/100 (PHP 4,554,281.79) AND UNDER TRUST ACCOUNT AMOUNTING TO THREE MILLION THREE HUNDRED FIFTY THOUSAND PESOS (PHP 3,350,000.00) FOR SEVERAL DISASTER-RELATED PURPOSES AND APPROVING/THE SAME AS SUPPLEMENTAL INVESTMENT PLAN. Author : Councilor B&nedictd S. Alborida
